title: Hogwarts Legacy
description: Embark on a magical journey in the wizarding world as a student at Hogwarts.

title: God of War: Ragnarok
description: Continue Kratos' journey in the Norse mythology, facing new challenges and gods.

title: The Last of Us Part II
description: An emotional action-adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world.

title: Demon's Souls
description: A remake of the classic action RPG with stunning graphics and challenging gameplay.

title: Spider-Man: Miles Morales
description: Play as Miles Morales and protect New York City as the new Spider-Man.

title: Astro's Playroom
description: Explore a delightful platformer showcasing the features of the PS5's DualSense controller.

title: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
description: Jump between dimensions in this action-packed platformer with stunning visuals.

title: Returnal
description: Uncover the mysteries of an alien planet in this roguelike third-person shooter.

title: Sackboy: A Big Adventure
description: Join Sackboy in a charming platforming adventure to save Craftworld.

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Embark on a Viking adventure in this open-world action RPG.

title: FIFA 21
description: Experience the excitement of soccer with improved gameplay and realistic graphics.

title: Deathloop
description: Navigate a time loop as an assassin in this stylish action game.

title: Resident Evil Village
description: Survive a horror-filled adventure in a mysterious village.

title: Hitman 3
description: Travel the world as Agent 47 and eliminate high-profile targets.

title: Ghost of Tsushima
description: Become a samurai and defend feudal Japan against Mongol invaders.

title: Hitman 2
description: Travel the world as Agent 47 and eliminate high-profile targets.

title: Godfall
description: Embark on a high-impact action combat experience in a fantasy world.

title: Watch Dogs: Legion
description: Hack and explore an open-world rendition of London in this action game.

title: Outriders
description: Team up for a cooperative shooter set in a dark sci-fi universe.

title: Marvel's Spider-Man: Remastered
description: Experience the beloved superhero story with improved graphics and performance.

title: Yakuza: Like a Dragon
description: Join Ichiban Kasuga and experience the Yakuza underworld in a new way.

title: Far Cry 6
description: Explore a tropical paradise turned dictatorship and join the revolution.

title: God of War 4
description: Witness Kratos' brutal quest for redemption as he battles gods and monsters.

title: WWE 2K23
description: .WWE 2K23 is the latest installment in the long-running series of professional wrestling video games, and the successor to WWE 2K22.
